alert.note: Alert for Price; Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued May 22 at 9:23PM CDT until May 23 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Sawyer and Price Counties. In Minnesota, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake and Central St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation and the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 8 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
